title: Trish Trash: Rollergirl from Mars Vol. 1
description: MEET TRISH TRASH.She's going to be the biggest hoverderby star on Mars. Just watch. Patricia "Trish Trash" Nupindju is a talented young hoverderby player on Mars 200 years in the future. Trish wants desperately to go pro because it seems like the only way to escape a future of poverty and hard labor on her family's moisture farm in Candor Chasma. But even if she could make the team, she's too young to get a contract, and her family is going broke faster than her escape velocity. The first volume of the new science fiction saga created by Jessica Abel.
author: Jessica Abel
